librariesAndCDN: Font Awesome: Used to integrate a collection of customizable vector icons, visually enriching the interface and guiding users in their interactions with the site.

i18next: Used to manage the internationalization of the application, allowing content to be offered in multiple languages and reaching a wider audience.
i18next-http-backend: Used to dynamically load translation files from the server, facilitating the management and updating of multilingual content.
Axios: Used to make HTTP requests in a simple and efficient manner, allowing data (such as JSON files) to be fetched and manipulated asynchronously and securely.
